CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: confetti shell
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with confetti and a small explosive charge, barely destructive but extremely humiliating.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Incendiary
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with incendiary agent. The agent is dispersed on impact, covering the area in flames.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Smoke
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with a smoke-producing agent. Explodes on impact to generate a thick smokescreen.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: EMP
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Creates an electro-magnetic burst on impact, temporarily disrupting electronic systems and Mechanoids.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Foam
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Special round designed for civilian fire-fighting purposes. Filled with fire-retardant foam to suppress fires in a large area.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Illumination
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Lights up a large area with the illumination agents insides that ignited on impact, lasts for roughtly 3 hours. May cause fire when ignited in enclosed space.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: mine layer
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Advanced missile designed for remote destribution of land mines.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: decoy
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Deploys a decoy projector on impact, distracts enemy attention.

ThingDef.label: aerial deployed mine
ThingDef.description: A tiny anti-personnel proximity mine deployed en masse via LGIS missiles and detonates once hostile personnel is detected within blast radius. Due to the ADM's nature of missile deployment, your colonists don't know their exact location thus won't automatically avoid them! Its small size prohibits complicated IFF system to be installed, rendering it impossible to deconstruct it safely, requiring manual detonation via gunfire or EMP blast to defuse. Its proximity sensor may be accidently triggered by colonists.

ThingDef.label: holographic decoy
ThingDef.description: A holographic decoy that attracts enemy aggression. It's internal battery lasts for 6 hours.

ThingDef.label: Taunt
ThingDef.description: A built-in loud speaker that attracts enemy aggression.
